IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: FURTHER THE STUDY OF PULP & PAPER AND RELATED SUBJECTS AT THE UNIVERSITY OF MAINE AND ENCOURAGE STUDENTS TO CONSIDER PAPER RELATED TECHNICAL CAREERS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: FURTHER THE STUDY OF PULP & PAPER AND RELATED SUBJECTS AT THE UNIVERSITY OF MAINE AND ENCOURAGE STUDENTS TO CONSIDER PAPER RELATED TECHNICAL CAREERS.
IRS990.Description: AWARDING OF SCHOLARSHIPS TO INDIVIDUAL STUDENTS AND GRANTS TO PROFESSORS. $739,510 OF SCHOLARSHIPS WERE AWARDED TO 122 STUDENTS AND $30,189 OF GRANTS WERE AWARDED TO 9 PROFESSORS DURING THE YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2010.

Activity2.Description: AWARDING OF GRANTS AND ASSISTANCE TO THE UNIVERSITY OF MAINE FOR THE SUPPORT OF TEACHING AND FACULTY ACTIVITIES.

IRS990ScheduleA.FactsAndCircumstancesTest: Part II, Line 17a--PART II, SECTION B, LINE 17A, FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES TEST:THE ORGANIZATION'S PERCENTAGE OF PUBLIC SUPPORT IS 5% BELOW THE 33 1/3THRESHOLD BECAUSE IN RECENT YEARS THE ORGANIZATION HAS RECEIVED A HIGHPERCENTAGE OF ITS SUPPORT FROM INVESTMENT INCOME FROM ITS ENDOWMENT FUNDS.THESE ENDOWMENTS FUNDS, HOWEVER, WERE ORIGINALLY CONTRIBUTED BY THEGENERAL PUBLIC.THE ORGANIZATION CONTINUES TO ACTIVELY SEEK FINANCIAL SUPPORT FROM THEGENERAL PUBLIC.THE ORGANIZATION'S REPRESENTATIVE GOVERNING BODY REPRESENTS A BROADINTEREST OF THE PUBLIC AND INCLUDES MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY, STUDENTS ASWELL AS INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE DIRECTLY AND INDIRECTLY INVOLVED IN THE PULPAND PAPER INDUSTRY.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: Part I, Line 7: Non-Fixed payments not listed above
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: MR. HEALY RECEIVED A BONUS FOR JOB PERFORMANCE IN THE AMOUNT OF APPROXIMATELY 10% OF HIS BASE PAY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MAILED TO APPROXIMATELY 200 FOUNDATINO MEMEBRS AS PART OF THE ANNUAL REPORT. ANNUAL REPORTS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE FOUNDATION'S OFFICE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY HAS BEEN PROVIDED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER FOR REVIEW AND SIGNATURE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS INITIALLY REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THEN THE FORM IS ALSO MAILED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS FOR THEIR REVIEW AND COMMENT PRIOR TO SUBMISSION TO THE IRS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7a: How Members or Shareholders Elect Governing Body
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION'S CORPORATE MEMBERS ELECT THE FOUNDATION'S EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 6: Explanation of Classes of Members or Shareholder
